**1. Phenotype data is classified as "dataset"**

+ To look at data based on different filters, you can add "Add tiles". Example: Looking at counts of female versus male participants


**2. Command line**

+ Install dxpy in conda environment
+ dx login to access platform

**3. Join the DNANexus community** 

**4. Useful Links**

https://dnanexus.gitbook.io/uk-biobank-rap/science-corner/gwas-ex?q=gwas  --> tutorial on how to run a GWAS analysis

https://dnanexus.gitbook.io/uk-biobank-rap/working-on-the-research-analysis-platform/using-spark-to-analyze-tabular-data#notebook-starting-code  --> tutorial on how to use Jupyter Notebook to analyze and visual tabular data

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YIPdhf3qbQA&t=2875s&ab_channel=DNAnexus --> how to use Jupyter Notebook 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=762PVlyZJ-U&ab_channel=DNAnexus --> how to run GWAS (Regenie)  

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_WKy5YHnPns&ab_channel=DNAnexus --> Overview of RAP platform
